body:
Corel PhotoPAINT 9 can export a cylindrical image into a Quicktime Panorama.
I used it allready with POV-Ray rendered cylindrical images.

--- stefkeB ---

MSN Foto's is de eenvoudigste manier om je foto's te delen en af te drukken:

subject: [Radiance-general] Re: QTVR panoramas
